title: Tool Reliability
description: Daily DCC tool invocation success rate and duration by event type (gold_tool_reliability_daily).

panels.title: Tool Success Rate (%) by Type
panels.description: Daily success rate for each DCC tool invocation type.  Low values flag broken tools or misconfigured environments.

targets.rawSql: SELECT event_date::TIMESTAMP AS time, event_type AS metric, success_rate_pct AS value FROM gold_tool_reliability_daily ORDER BY event_date, event_type

panels.title: Avg Tool Duration (ms) by Type
panels.description: Average duration of successful tool invocations per day.  Rising values can indicate performance regressions or slow NFS mounts.

targets.rawSql: SELECT event_date::TIMESTAMP AS time, event_type AS metric, avg_duration_ms AS value FROM gold_tool_reliability_daily WHERE avg_duration_ms IS NOT NULL ORDER BY event_date, event_type
